name: Kult of Ktulu: Olympic
description: Kult of Ktulu : Olympic immerses the player in the ocean depths, in search of the dark secrets of a mystical cult. Meet celebrities from the first quarter of the twentieth century on board and lead the investigation with Elena. Help her to survive in this adventure at the confines of darkness.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP3) Processor: Dual Core 2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory Storage: 200 MB available space
